Package io.github.coho04.githubapi.entities.repositories

Class GHIssue

java.lang.Object
io.github.coho04.githubapi.bases.GHBase
io.github.coho04.githubapi.bases.ClassBase
io.github.coho04.githubapi.entities.repositories.GHIssue
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpRequestInterface, JSONHelper
public class GHIssue extends ClassBase
Represents a GitHub issue. This class is a part of the GitHub API library.
